text: يَكَادُ ٱلۡبَرۡقُ يَخۡطَفُ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡۖ كُلَّمَآ أَضَآءَ لَهُم مَّشَوۡاْ فِيهِ وَإِذَآ أَظۡلَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ قَامُواْۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَذَهَبَ بِسَمۡعِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

translation.en: The lightning almost snatches away their sight. Every time it lights [the way] for them, they walk therein; but when darkness comes over them, they stand [still]. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken away their hearing and their sight. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent
translation.id: Hampir saja kilat itu menyambar penglihatan mereka. Setiap kali (kilat itu) menyinari, mereka berjalan di bawah (sinar) itu, dan apabila gelap menerpa mereka, mereka berhenti. Sekiranya Allah menghendaki, niscaya Dia hilangkan pendengaran dan penglihatan mereka. Sungguh, Allah Mahakuasa atas segala sesuatu
